title: Issues with slight game freeze
body:
Ok, I've been playing since beta and I love this game, but lately these past few months have been difficult.

My frame rate according to the status bar up in the corner stays between 150-200 FPS.

My ping is always around 60-80.

But every 1-2 minutes, my screen freezes for about 1-3 seconds and I can't do anything.

If the status area is saying my FPS and ping are ok, what else could it be?

Any suggestions would truly help.

(and i've tried the alt+enter (windowed mode) and it still does it)

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10 and recently updated?  The [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) was enabled for some players which has been causing some fps issues and freezes.  Disabling that could help!  Otherwise, I suggest going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case your drivers or game files need tuning up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I don't have the Xbox game bar running.. I think I disabled that a long time ago. my FPS still shows over 150-200... so, maybe the FPS status isn't accurate? I don't know :(

There could still be some sort of driver or hardware issue if you're having these freezes, and we should take a closer look to find out for sure.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look and help individually with this!
